class xierpa3.attributes.gradient.LinearGradient(side, c1, p1, c2, p2, type=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xierpa3.attributes.gradient.Gradient

build_html(name, builder, prefix=None)¶

Html gradient must be inside an svg canvas self.c1 = c1 # Start color self.p1 = p1 # Percentage in 100 of start self.c2 = c2 # End color self.p2 = p2 # Percentage in 100 of end

value¶
class xierpa3.attributes.values.Selection(param, values)¶

Bases: xierpa3.attributes.values.Value

If <i>param</i> exists as attributes in the <i>params</i>, and its value exists in <i>values</i> as key, then use that value as selection. Otherwise the value of key “default” is used, which can be <b>None</b>, so it gets ignored by the builder.

selectFromParams(params)¶
